```{r setup, include=FALSE}
### loads packages

```

``` {r enrolled, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}

rolarea_covars <- readRDS("rolarea_covars.rds")
rolarea_ndvi <- read_csv("rolarea_ndvi.csv")
rolarea_df <- readRDS("rolarea_df.rds")

```


``` {r los rios match pool, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
#setting working directory

losrios_CIREN_covars <- readRDS("losrios_CIREN_covars.rds")

#setwd("C:/Users/garci/Dropbox/chile_reforestation/data/property_ndvi/new_CIREN_ndvi/match/losrios")

# load los rios ndvi time series for all ciren properties
temp = list.files(pattern="*.csv")
losrios_ndvi = bind_rows(lapply(temp, read_csv))%>%
  #filter(objectid == 59515) %>%
  select(objectid, year, mean) %>%
  distinct(objectid, year, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  spread(key = "year", value = "mean")# cast ndvi into wide format

# to make sure I'm not selecting treated properties
# join los Rios CIREN properties with property df based on rol
losrios_matchpool <-  st_read(
  "input_data/PROPIEDADES_RURALES/LOS_RÍOS_CIREN_2018.shp"
  ) %>%
  rename(rptpre_rol = rol)
  stringdist_left_join(rolarea_df, by = c("rol"), maxdist = 1)%>%
    mutate(comuna_stringd = stringdist(rptpre_comuna, desccomu, method = "dl"),
           treat = 0) %>%# compute stringd between comuna names
    filter(comuna_stringd > 1 | is.na(rptpro_id)) %>%# drop anything with a string d less than or equal to 1
    inner_join(losrios_CIREN_covars, by = c("objectid", "rol", "desccomu"))%>%
    inner_join(losrios_ndvi, by = "objectid")
    
               


```

``` {r biobio match pool, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include = FALSE, eval = TRUE}

    filter(comuna_stringd > 1 | is.na(rptpro_id)) # drop anything with a string d less than or equal to 1
```
